item.title: CKAN - open-source platform for your datasets. Troubleshooting
item.description: CMS for open data? CKAN is a free & open-source platform to publish and host datasets in your own server. It has great search integration using Solr, API, data visualization and many more features that makes open data discoverable. The full list of features can be found here. In order to install CKAN on your server, you have two options either from source (via GitHub repository) or from the package if you are using Ubuntu.
